title: If the display property of an item is set to "none", it doesn't take effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to "none" in the properties view, it does not have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The display property should hide the item when set to "none" in the properties view of the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to the PDF emitter.
2. Open the "properties" view of the label.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to "none".
4. Verify that the label is hidden in the new PDF emitter.
